name: Labrador Retriever
description: Originally bred for fishing and retrieving nets in Newfoundland, Labs are now known for their friendly and outgoing nature.

name: German Shepherd
description: Developed in Germany, German Shepherds are highly intelligent and versatile working dogs, often used in police and military roles.

name: Golden Retriever
description: Bred in Scotland as gun dogs, Golden Retrievers are friendly, intelligent, and devoted companions.

name: Poodle
description: Poodles are known for their intelligence, elegance, and hypoallergenic coat. They were originally water retrievers in Germany.

name: Bulldog
description: Originally used for bull-baiting, Bulldogs are now gentle, friendly, and great family pets.

name: Beagle
description: Beagles are scent hounds that were originally bred for hunting small game like rabbits. They are friendly and curious.

name: Rottweiler
description: Rottweilers were originally herding dogs in Germany. They are confident, courageous, and protective of their families.

name: Siberian Husky
description: Huskies were bred by the Chukchi people in Siberia for sledding and endurance. They are friendly, active, and energetic.

name: French Bulldog
description: French Bulldogs are companion dogs that originated in France. They have a playful and affectionate personality.

name: Dachshund
description: Dachshunds, or wiener dogs, were originally bred in Germany for hunting badgers. They are lively and courageous.

name: Pembroke Welsh Corgi
description: Corgis were herding dogs in Wales. They are intelligent, alert, and make excellent companions.

name: Doberman Pinscher
description: Dobermans were developed in Germany for protection and guard duties. They are loyal, alert, and fearless.

name: Australian Shepherd
description: Originally bred in the United States for herding, Australian Shepherds are intelligent and highly trainable.

name: Shih Tzu
description: Shih Tzus are small companion dogs that were bred in Tibet. They are affectionate and great for indoor living.

name: Pomeranian
description: Pomeranians, or Poms, are small and lively dogs that were originally bred in Germany. They are friendly and extroverted.

name: Chihuahua
description: Chihuahuas are the smallest breed, originating from Mexico. They are sassy, alert, and make great companions.

name: Shetland Sheepdog
description: Shelties were bred in Scotland for herding sheep. They are intelligent, energetic, and great with families.

name: Yorkshire Terrier
description: Yorkies are small dogs known for their luxurious coats. They make affectionate and lively companions.

name: Boxer
description: Boxers are medium-sized dogs that were originally bred for hunting and guarding. They are playful and energetic.

name: Dalmatian
description: Dalmatians are known for their distinctive spots. They were historically used as carriage dogs and firehouse mascots.

name: Pug
description: Pugs are small dogs with wrinkled faces. They are affectionate, charming, and make great companions.

name: Siberian Husky
description: Huskies were bred by the Chukchi people in Siberia for sledding and endurance. They are friendly, active, and energetic.

name: Great Dane
description: Great Danes are giant dogs that were originally bred for hunting. They are friendly, patient, and great with kids.

name: Miniature Schnauzer
description: Miniature Schnauzers are small dogs that were originally bred in Germany. They are alert, spirited, and make great companions.

name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
description: Cavalier King Charles Spaniels are small companion dogs that were originally bred in the United Kingdom. They are affectionate and graceful.

name: Maltese
description: Maltese are small companion dogs that were originally bred in Italy. They are gentle, playful, and make great companions.

name: Boston Terrier
description: Boston Terriers are small dogs that were originally bred in the United States. They are friendly, lively, and make great companions.
